headline: Trump to announce $70 billion in AI and energy investments
summary: Investing.com -- President Donald Trump will announce $70 billion in artificial intelligence and energy investments in Pennsylvania on Tuesday, as part of White House efforts to accelerate development of emerging technology, according to a Bloomberg report on Monday.

headline: Energy Is Taking a Hit Today. Oil Prices Are Lower.
summary: Oil prices and energy-related stocks were down across the board on Monday morning.  WTI crude prices, the U.S. benchmark, are down 0.1% today to $64.27 a barrel.  The S&P 500 energy sector is the biggest loser of the day so far, down 1.1%.
